email.subject: Fwd: Ortho Lunch
email.user_instruction: Chat, below is an email thread where we had MD-to-MD lunch with Devon McDonald who is a physical therapists.  We identified that she does share her patients with us but we need to work on our Epic integration.  Could you log an Md-to-MD activity with Dr. McDonald and capture the notes from the thread?
email.content:
User Request:
Chat, below is an email thread where we had MD-to-MD lunch with Devon McDonald who is a physical therapists.  We identified that she does share her patients with us but we need to work on our Epic integration.  Could you log an Md-to-MD activity with Dr. McDonald and capture the notes from the thread?

Email Thread:
---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Blake Thomson < blakethomson8@gmail.com > Date: Fri, Jul 25, 2025 at 2:22 PM Subject: Re: Ortho Lunch To: Devon McDonald < dvnmcdonald@gmail.com > Hi Devon,  Thanks for taking the time to meet with us! I wanted to follow up on a couple of items from the meeting:  - We understand that there are challenges with the Epic integration. I will take this back to our team and see what we can do.  - We appreciate you sharing your patients with Dr. Uquillis ! We value the relationship and ability to serve our patients - I will follow up with you in 60-days to re-assess if there are any changes on your end.  Thanks so much !  Blake On Fri, Jul 25, 2025 at 2:20 PM Devon McDonald < dvnmcdonald@gmail.com > wrote: Hi Blake,  Yes, I am still available for Lunch. Looking forward to the discussion.  Devon On Fri, Jul 25, 2025 at 2:20 PM Blake Thomson < blakethomson8@gmail.com > wrote: Hi Devon,  I wanted to follow up on behalf of Cedars and Dr. Uquillis and see if you are still available for lunch on Friday, July 25th?  Thanks !  
 -- Devon McDonald   | Video Editor   |  Red Iron NYC  |  212-675-2828 devon@redironnyc.com   |  www.redironnyc.com/ 18 West 21st St., 11th fl  | New York, NY 10010

classification.reasoning: The email explicitly requests to "log an MD-to-MD activity with Dr. McDonald". The keywords "log activity" and the context of a professional medical meeting clearly indicate a call logging action. The request is direct and unambiguous, hence the high confidence score.

extraction.subject: MD-to-MD Lunch with Dr. McDonald re: Epic Integration
extraction.description: Had lunch meeting with Dr. Devon McDonald to discuss patient sharing and Epic integration. Dr. McDonald currently shares patients with Dr. Uquillis but there are some challenges with the Epic integration that need to be addressed. The meeting was productive and established good rapport. Blake Thomson will follow up with Dr. McDonald in 60 days to reassess any changes.

extraction.subject: MD-to-MD Lunch with Devon McDonald and Dr. Uquillis
extraction.description:
Had a lunch meeting with Devon McDonald to discuss patient sharing and Epic integration. Key points discussed:
- Current challenges with Epic integration system were identified
- Confirmed that Devon McDonald is actively sharing patients with Dr. Uquillis
- Discussed maintaining and strengthening the existing patient referral relationship
- Blake will follow up in 60 days to check on any changes
